admin.name: Name
admin.no_pending_users: There are no users waiting for approval
admin.approve_user_content: By approving {{name}} you will allow them to access the platform. Do you want to proceed?
admin.reject_user_content: By rejecting {{name}} you prevent access to the platform. The user will be notified. Do you want to proceed?
admin.delete_user_content: By deleting {{name}} you will permanently remove their account from the system. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?

admin.user_rejected_desc: The user has been rejected and will not be able to access the platform.
admin.user_deleted_desc: The user has been permanently removed from the system.

benefits.title: Why Choose Gervis?
benefits.subtitle: Tangible benefits for your financial consulting business

save_time.title: Save Time
save_time.description: Reduce time spent on administrative tasks and focus on delivering valuable advice to your clients.

reduce_errors.title: Reduce Errors
reduce_errors.description: Minimize manual errors with digitized and automated processes for client documentation.

grow_aum.title: Increase Assets Under Management
grow_aum.description: Attract and retain more clients through a professional and technologically advanced experience.

improve_satisfaction.title: Improve Satisfaction
improve_satisfaction.description: Offer a more responsive and personalized service to increase client satisfaction and retention.

compliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
compliance.description: Easily maintain compliance with Italian and European financial regulations with always up-to-date documentation.

insights.title: In-depth Insights
insights.description: Gain detailed analysis of client portfolios to provide more informed and strategic advice.

hero.description: Gervis empowers financial consultants with AI-driven tools so you can deliver to your clients an exceptional financial advice experience. Automate documentation, optimize client management, and exploit the full potential of applied AI with Gervis.
hero.title: Gervis Financial Advisor Platform

feature1.title: Portfolio Analysis
feature1.description: Analyze client portfolios with sophisticated algorithms to identify opportunities and risks.

feature2.title: AI-Powered Insights
feature2.description: Leverage artificial intelligence to generate personalized financial recommendations.

feature3.title: Secure & Compliant
feature3.description: Built with security and regulatory compliance in mind, including Italian financial regulations.

features.title: What We Offer
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools to enhance your consulting service and provide added value to your clients.

smart_crm.title: Smart CRM
smart_crm.description: Simplify client onboarding with digital forms and automated data collection. Easily organize and manage client profiles, documents, and communications in a single centralized platform.

junior_assistant.title: Sigmund
junior_assistant.description: Gervis analyzes client profiles based on provided data and logs, offering advisors continuously updated insights into client investment needs and styles.

portfolio_intelligence.title: Spark
portfolio_intelligence.description: Gervis provides daily investment ideas based on updated financial news and client investment profile.

onboarding.title: Digitized Client Onboarding
onboarding.description: Simplify and accelerate client onboarding with digital forms and automated data collection.

client_management.title: Centralized Client Management
client_management.description: Easily organize and manage client profiles, documents, and communications in a single platform.

daily_market_update.title: Daily Market Update
daily_market_update.description: Receive daily updates on financial markets with AI-powered analysis and interact with our AI chatbot to get answers to your questions about market trends and economic insights.

junior_sales_assistant.title: Junior Sales Assistant
junior_sales_assistant.description: AI-powered assistant that provides daily follow-up suggestions for core clients, identifies engagement opportunities, and helps you prioritize client interactions based on data analysis.

wealth_assessment.title: Wealth Assessment
wealth_assessment.description: Detailed analysis of client assets with intuitive visualizations and comprehensive reporting.

ai_allocation.title: AI-Powered Allocation
ai_allocation.description: Asset allocation suggestions based on advanced artificial intelligence algorithms.

about.title: About Us
about.description1: Gervis is a product developed and managed by GT AI Solutions. GT AI Solutions' mission is to integrate artificial intelligence solutions in all businesses to free up valuable time and allow companies to focus on their core business.
about.description2: We firmly believe that artificial intelligence is the key to transforming business processes, eliminating repetitive and low-value activities, enabling people to dedicate themselves to what really matters: relationships, creativity, and innovation.
about.description3: Gervis represents the application of this philosophy in the financial advisory sector, offering advisors advanced tools to automate document management, optimize onboarding processes, and provide a superior client experience.

approval.title: Account Pending Approval
approval.description: Your account is pending verification by the Gervis management team
approval.status_message: Your account has been created but requires approval before you can use all features. This process usually takes 1-2 business days.
approval.next_steps: You will receive an email notification when your account is approved. In the meantime, you can return to the main page.

verification.title: Verify your email address
verification.description: We have sent a 4-digit PIN code to {email}. Enter the code to complete verification.
verification.invalid_pin: Invalid PIN. Check your email and try again.
verification.error: An error occurred while verifying the PIN.

pdf.subject: Client Financial Profile

coverLetter.heading: FINANCIAL ADVISORY SERVICES
coverLetter.subject: Subject
coverLetter.title: Welcome – Beginning of Our Collaboration
coverLetter.introduction: It is a pleasure to welcome you and begin this collaboration. My goal is to offer you a highly personalized advisory service, designed to help you manage your assets strategically and efficiently, with a cost-conscious approach and in full compliance with current regulations.
coverLetter.collaboration: Through in-depth analysis and advanced tools, we will work together to:
coverLetter.servicePoint1: Optimize your portfolio composition based on your objectives and risk profile.
coverLetter.servicePoint2: Identify tailored solutions for more effective and sustainable asset management over time.
coverLetter.servicePoint3: Ensure transparent advice in line with industry best practices.
coverLetter.servicePoint4: Provide regular updates and adjustments based on market changes and the evolution of your needs.
points: Optimize your portfolio composition based on your objectives and risk profile.
Identify tailored solutions for more effective and sustainable asset management over time.
Ensure transparent advice in line with industry best practices.
coverLetter.process: As discussed, to complete the onboarding process, I invite you to verify and return the attached signed documents. This step is necessary to formalize our collaboration and proceed with the planned activities.
coverLetter.contactInfo: I remain available for any clarification or need. Thank you for your trust, I am confident that this will be the beginning of a valuable journey.
